.site-header, 
.ast-transparent-header #masthead 
{ background: #0006;}

.archive #primary 
{margin-top:4rem;}

.ast-plain-container.ast-single-post #primary, 
.home.page #primary, 
#primary, 
.post-type-archive #primary {margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;}

.slick-slider {
	margin-bottom:2rem
}

.slick-slider .slick-list { 
    opacity: 0; 
    position: absolute; 
}

.slick-slider.slick-initialized {
    background: none;
}

.slick-slider.slick-initialized .slick-list { 
    opacity: 1;
    position: relative;
    transition: opacity 0.2s ease-in;
}

#facilities, 
.content-section {margin-bottom:2rem!important;}

.content-section h4, 
#facilities h4 
{
	display:block;
	border-bottom:1px solid #ccc;
	padding-bottom:1rem;
}

#facilities ul li, 
.content-section ul li
{
width:50%;
}

#facilities ul li, 
.content-section ul 
{
margin: 0;
list-style: none;
display: inline-flex;
}

.post-type-archive-tour .wpgb-facet.wpgb-facet-51,
.post-type-archive-tour .wpgb-facet.wpgb-facet-49,

.post-type-archive-event .wpgb-facet.wpgb-facet-53,
.post-type-archive-tour .wpgb-facet.wpgb-facet-37, 
.post-type-archive-tour .wpgb-facet.wpgb-facet-53,
.post-type-archive-attraction .wpgb-facet.wpgb-facet-37, 
.post-type-archive-attraction .wpgb-facet.wpgb-facet-53,

{display:none}

.archive .wp-grid-builder .wpgb-area-top-2>div {
    -ms-flex: 0 0 33%;
    flex: 0 0 33%;
    max-width: 33%;
    padding: 0 16px;
}

.wpgb-area.wpgb-area-top-1 .wpgb-facet 
{-ms-flex: 0 0 33%;
    flex: 0 0 33%;
    max-width: 33%;}

.archive .wpgb-result-count 
{font-size:24px;font-weight:800;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:-1px;}

.home .uagb-tabs__body-wrap .wpgb-facet-title, .home .wpgb-facet-title {display:none}

.home .wp-block-uagb-tabs .wpgb-facet fieldset, 
.home .wp-block-uagb-tabs .wpgb-facet fieldset:last-child,
.home .wp-block-uagb-tabs .wpgb-facet button 
{margin-bottom:0!important}

.cta-cover-blocks-secondary, 
.cta-cover-blocks .wp-block-cover 
{
    border-radius:5px;
}

.cta-cover-blocks-secondary.cta-cover-blocks .wp-block-cover h3 
{
    transition: 0.25s;
    color: #fff;
	font-size:26px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: 600;
}

.gm-style-iw .gm-style-iw-d .wpgb-map-marker-body .wpgb-booking-marker-img {
    height: 120px!important;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center center;
}

.gbwc-heading-style h2 {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: minmax(30px, 1fr) auto minmax(30px, 1fr);
    align-items: center;
    text-align: center;
    grid-gap: 30px;
    width: 100%;
}

.gbwc-heading-style h2:before,
.gbwc-heading-style h2:after 
{
    content: '';
    border-top: 2px solid #efefef;
}

.ast-list-inline {
	margin: 0;
    list-style: none;
    display: inline-flex;
}

.ast-list-inline li{
	padding:0 15px 0 0;
}

.ast-list-inline li h4 {
font-weight:800;
}
.ast-list-inline li h4 span{
font-weight:700;
font-size:16px;
	line-height:1
}

ul.wp-block-post-template {margin-left:0;}

.simplefavorite-button {margin-bottom:0; font-size:14px}

.ast-builder-html-element {max-height:80px;margin-top:-15px}

.simplefavorite-button ion-icon {font-size:22px;margin-bottom:0!important;}

.ast-list-inline ion-icon {
    margin: 0 10px -3px 0;
}

.ast-header-html {width:400px;}

.simplefavorite-button {
    margin-bottom: 0;
    font-size: 14px;
    width: 100%;
    border: 1px solid #000;
    border-radius: 10px;
    color: #000;
    background: #fff;
	margin-bottom:1rem;
	font-family: 'Nunito Sans',sans-serif;
    font-weight: 300;
    font-size: 18px;
    font-size: 1rem;
	padding:15px;
}

.simplefavorite-button.active {
    opacity: .5;
}

.single-favorite a {color:#000;}

.single-favorite img {margin-bottom:1rem; border-radius:5px}

.single-favorite .simplefavorite-button {margin-top:1rem;width:auto;}

.simplefavorites-clear {width:auto!important;margin-bottom:1rem;
	font-family: 'Nunito Sans',sans-serif;
    font-weight: 300;
    font-size: 18px;
    font-size: 1rem;
	padding:15px;}

.contact-points ion-icon
{float: left;
    font-size: 26px;
    color: #000;}

.ast-advanced-headers-wrap h1 {
margin-bottom: 1.2rem;
font-weight:900;
font-size:55px;
}
.ast-header-html.inner-link-style-,
.ast-builder-html-element, #weatherWidget {width:240px}
.ast-builder-html-element p {height:3rem}

.wp-block-getwid-custom-post-type {
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.single.single-post h3, .single.single-post h4, .single.single-post h5 {text-transform:capitalize;}

.slick-list {max-height:525px;}

.non-atw-featured img {border-radius:10px;}
.content-section #listing-contacts {
	display:none;
}
.aioseo-breadcrumbs {margin-bottom:1rem}
.single.single-post .entry-meta {border-bottom:1px solid #eee;padding:0 0 20px;}
.single.single-post .entry-meta a, .single.single-post .entry-meta span {color:#999; text-transform:uppercase; font-size:16px}

.single.single-post .wp-block-image.alignwide {margin-top:3rem;margin-bottom:3rem}
.mega-menu-cta {margin-top:0.5rem;}
.mega-menu-cta a {color:#fff; font-weight:800;}
.location-map {margin:-10px 0}
#homepage-header .wp-block-getwid-section__inner-wrapper {max-width:900px;}
#homepage-header .wp-block-search__inside-wrapper {margin-bottom:40px;}
.hot-deal-wrap {
	background:#000;
	color:#fff;
	text-align:center; 
	padding:1rem;
	margin-bottom:2rem!important;
}
.hot-deal-wrap h3 a, 
.hot-deal-wrap h5{
	color:#fff;
	text-align:center;
}
.hot-deal-wrap h3, .hot-deal-wrap h3 a, .hot-deal-wrap h5{
	margin-bottom:0;
	line-height:1.2;
}

.hot-deal-content {margin:2rem 0;}
.hot-deal-title a, .post-title a {
	text-transform:uppercase;
	color:#000;
}
#hot-deal.hot-deal-listing img {border-radius:5px;}
#hot-deal.hot-deal-listing h4 {text-transform:uppercase; font-size:22px;display:block; padding:1rem 0; border-top:1px solid #eee; margin-bottom:0; font-weight:200;}

.main-header-menu .menu-item:last-child:hover>.sub-menu {
    right: 0;
    left: auto;
}

.wp-block-getwid-custom-post-type .wp-block-getwid-custom-post-type__post-title a, .wp-block-getwid-custom-post-type .wp-block-getwid-template-post-title a {color:#000000;padding:2rem 0!important;}

.wp-block-getwid-custom-post-type .wp-block-getwid-custom-post-type__post-title {color:#000000;padding:1rem 0!important;}
.wp-block-getwid-custom-post-type__post {margin-bottom:1rem;padding-bottom:2rem;border: 1px solid #eee;}

}
.search-filter .wpgb-facet-title {display:none;}

margin-bottom: 0px!important;
}

width:100%;
}

}

The Edge - Weekly Newsletter

Your competitive edge for the week ahead, The Edge gives you a quick look at the business news and events to help you plan your strategy for the week. You’ll get business-related news from local, state, and federal government, plus information on upcoming events to keep you well-informed and connected. The Edge is also an affordable, strategic option to stay top of mind with current and prospective clients by reaching this target market with advertising linked directly to your website.

	height: 50px;
	line-height: 50px;
	display: inline-block;
	border-radius: 30px;
	text-decoration: none;
	font-family: "lato", sans-serif;
	min-width: 150px;
	text-align: center;
	box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(166,166,166,.5);
	transition: .25s;
}
body .gform_footer .button,
body .gform_page_footer .button,
body .gform_wrapper.gravity-theme .gform_save_link.button,
body .gform_wrapper.gravity-theme .gform_previous_button.button {
	background: #BC9B6A;
	background-color: #BC9B6A;
	color: #fff;
}
body .gform_footer .button:hover,
body .gform_page_footer .button:hover,
body .gform_wrapper.gravity-theme .gform_save_link.button:hover,
body .gform_wrapper.gravity-theme .gform_previous_button.button:hover {
	background: #b39c77;
	background-color: #b39c77;
	color: #fff;
}


/******************************************************************************************************************/

a {
  color: #b39c77;
}
a:hover,
a:focus,
a:active {
  color: #6f5e47;
}

.main-navigation .current-menu-item > a,
.main-navigation .current-menu-ancestor > a {
  color: #b39c77;
}
.main-navigation li:hover > a,
.main-navigation li.focus > a {
  color: #6f5e47;
}

.main-navigation ul ul li a:hover {
  color: #6f5e47;
}

h6 a {
  background-color: #BC9B6A;
}
h6 a:hover {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}


.home #experience hr,
.home #successes hr {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}

.home #homeCTA .container {
  border-top: 2px solid #b39c77;
  border-bottom: 2px solid #b39c77;
}

.page-template-about #cfb-difference hr {
  background-color: #b39c77;
  color: #BC9B6A;
}

.page-template-about #our-focus hr {
  background-color: #b39c77;
  color: #BC9B6A;
}

.page-template-about #our-focus .one_third h3:before {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}

.page-template-about #contact-us .container {
  border-top: 1px solid #b39c77;
}

.page-template-about #contact-us input[type="submit"] {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}


.page-template-investment-approach #main hr {
  background-color: #b39c77;
  color: #BC9B6A;
}

.page-template-investment-approach #main .one_third h3:before {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}

.page-template-investment-approach #main .approach-submenu span:hover {
  color: #b39c77;
}

.page-template-portfolio #main .filters li:last-child a {
  border-right: 2px solid #b39c77;
}
.page-template-portfolio #main .filters li a {
  border: 2px solid #b39c77;
  border-right: 1px solid #b39c77;
}

.page-template-portfolio #main .filters li.selected a {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}


.page-template-portfolio #main .filters li ul li:hover {
  color: #b39c77;
}

.page-template-portfolio #main .investments .see-more .alphabet span:hover {
  color: #b39c77;
}

.page-template-portfolio #main .investment .investment-date span.status {
  color: #b39c77;
}

.blog #banner .newsletter {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}

.blog #main .year-filter li:last-child a {
  border-right: 2px solid #b39c77;
}

.blog #main .year-filter li a {
  border: 2px solid #b39c77;
  border-right: 1px solid #b39c77;
}
.blog #main .year-filter li a.selected {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}

.single .main-navigation .sub-menu li a:hover {
  color: #b39c77;
}

.single #content .category-news .entry-header:after {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}


.page-template-contact #main form .submit input {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}
.image-info hr {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}

#main hr {
  background-color: #b39c77;
}


#main p.cat-header,
#main ul li.cat-header {
  color: #b39c77;
}

.page-cta .container {
  border-top: 1px solid #b39c77;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #b39c77;
}
  .main-navigation .menu-navigation-container ul li a:hover {
    color: #b39c77;
  }

  .main-navigation.mobileOpen .menu-toggle span {
    background-color: #b39c77;
  }

  .blog #main .year-filter:before {
    background-color: #b39c77;
  }

  .blog #main .year-filter ul {
    border: 0px solid #b39c77;
  }

}

/*event module feed*/
.simpleList .mn-scroll-container {
	height: auto;
	padding-top:10px;

}
.simpleList .mn-scroll-item {
	-moz-border-radius: 5px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px;
	background-clip: padding-box;
	background-color: transparent;
	border-radius: 0;
	color: #231f20;
	margin: 10px 0 10px;
	position: relative;
	border-bottom: 1px dotted;
	display: block;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
}
.simpleList .mn-scroll-item:hover {
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #231f20;
}
.simpleList .mn-scroll-name, .simpleList .mn-scroll-teaser, .simpleList .mn-scroll-location {
	display: block;
	padding: 5px 0 0;
	position: relative;
}
.simpleList .mn-scroll-location {
	font-style: italic;
}
.simpleList .mn-scroll-link {
	color: inherit;
	text-decoration: none;
	display: block;
	font-weight: 500;
}
.simpleList .mn-scroll-link:hover {
	text-decoration: underline;
}
.simpleList .mn-scroll-date {
	font-size: 130%;
	font-weight: 400;
	left: auto;
	position: relative;
	text-align: left;
	top: auto;
	width: 100%;
	display: block;
	padding: 0;
}

<div class="fl-col-group fl-node-3l4xc1k6u2a9 fl-col-group-nested fl-col-group-equal-height fl-col-group-align-center" data-node="3l4xc1k6u2a9">
			<div class="fl-col fl-node-l0o3wm5rsu41" data-node="l0o3wm5rsu41">
	<div class="fl-col-content fl-node-content"><div class="fl-module fl-module-heading fl-node-4jga3t95cuho" data-node="4jga3t95cuho">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<h2 class="fl-heading">
		<span class="fl-heading-text">Economic Development Week</span>
	</h2>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="fl-module fl-module-rich-text fl-node-q6h1p8al54de" data-node="q6h1p8al54de">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<div class="fl-rich-text">
	<p><em><strong>New In 2024</strong></em></p>
<p>In collaboration with the Columbia County Economic Development Department, the Chamber of Commerce is thrilled to announce the debut of the Columbia County Economic Development Week in 2024.</p>
<p>This exciting week-long event kicks off with an engaging breakfast seminar on the intricacies of economic development. Throughout the week, attendees will have the chance to embark on enlightening tours of diverse sites across the county. Culminating in style, the festivities will wrap up with an exclusive luncheon tailored for esteemed stakeholders, investors, and invaluable community partners.</p>
<p>Our aim during this significant week is twofold: to honor the unwavering commitment of businesses and industries that have continuously invested in Columbia County, and to collectively chart a visionary course for its future growth and development.</p>
<p>Sign up for the <a href="https://web.lakecitychamber.com/event-calendar/Details/economic-development-101-seminar-1099010">Economic Development 101 Seminar</a> here and register for the<a href="https://web.lakecitychamber.com/event-calendar/Details/economic-development-week-luncheon-1099007"> Economic Development Week Luncheon</a> here.</p>
</div>
	</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
	</div>
</div>
</div>
	</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="fl-row fl-row-full-width fl-row-bg-none fl-node-svx7ewq8hagl fl-animation fl-fade-up" data-node="svx7ewq8hagl" data-animation-delay="0" data-animation-duration="1">
	<div class="fl-row-content-wrap">
						<div class="fl-row-content fl-row-fixed-width fl-node-content">
		
<div class="fl-col-group fl-node-ealc4uz90fix fl-col-group-equal-height fl-col-group-align-center" data-node="ealc4uz90fix">
			<div class="fl-col fl-node-rvj098eaxs5o fl-col-small" data-node="rvj098eaxs5o">
	<div class="fl-col-content fl-node-content"><div class="fl-module fl-module-heading fl-node-f417ib36ze5o" data-node="f417ib36ze5o">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<h2 class="fl-heading">
		<span class="fl-heading-text">Annual Meeting & Chamber Ball</span>
	</h2>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="fl-module fl-module-rich-text fl-node-lr6co1fh0qiv" data-node="lr6co1fh0qiv">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<div class="fl-rich-text">
	<p>Indulge in an unforgettable evening of opulence and revelry at the highly anticipated annual Chamber Ball - an unrivaled networking affair renowned as the pinnacle of the year. This spectacular event serves as a time-honored tradition to celebrate the previous year's exceptional accomplishments while casting a vision for the future.</p>
<p>The highly anticipated annual meeting segment of the evening features the introduction of the new Board of Directors, along with the symbolic passing of the baton to the incoming president. A delectable catered dinner, riveting entertainment, and an exciting silent auction add to the allure of the evening, promising a night of unparalleled enchantment.</p>
</div>
	</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

	<div class="fl-col-content fl-node-content">
<div class="fl-col-group fl-node-chzs5djbu74t fl-col-group-nested fl-col-group-equal-height fl-col-group-align-center" data-node="chzs5djbu74t">
			<div class="fl-col fl-node-qb7ly9garxup fl-col-small" data-node="qb7ly9garxup">
	<div class="fl-col-content fl-node-content"><div class="fl-module fl-module-heading fl-node-r4upvji8xdto" data-node="r4upvji8xdto">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<h2 class="fl-heading">
		<span class="fl-heading-text">Sportsman Showcase: Annual Golf Tournament & Cornhole Tournament </span>
	</h2>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="fl-module fl-module-rich-text fl-node-vp71exsd3jtz" data-node="vp71exsd3jtz">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<div class="fl-rich-text">
	<p>Experience the thrill of victory and join us for our two-part series that caters to every sports enthusiast! Launched in 2021, the Chamber of Commerce's "Cornhole Tournament" is the ultimate high-stakes competition, featuring the best players in the game. With the presence of food trucks, music, and elite players, this event is a must-attend for all.</p>
<p>If golf is more your style, our annual golf tournament is the perfect fit for you. With almost one hundred golfers participating, the tournament offers a fun and friendly competition. You can also enjoy classic competitions, mobile snack & drink carts, and multiple chances to hit a hole in one! This legendary event is one of the most enjoyable events of the spring season. Don't miss out on either of these exhilarating events!</p>
</div>
	</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="fl-col-group fl-node-fto29ckipwuq fl-col-group-equal-height fl-col-group-align-center" data-node="fto29ckipwuq">
			<div class="fl-col fl-node-p2u0bi5a7mgq fl-col-has-cols" data-node="p2u0bi5a7mgq">
	<div class="fl-col-content fl-node-content"><div class="fl-module fl-module-heading fl-node-e7rdhik0v4sg" data-node="e7rdhik0v4sg">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<h2 class="fl-heading">
		<span class="fl-heading-text">The Gateway City Craft Beer & Wine Festival</span>
	</h2>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="fl-module fl-module-rich-text fl-node-3pahbxzu571i" data-node="3pahbxzu571i">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<div class="fl-rich-text">
	<p>Indulge in the ultimate sensory experience at the highly acclaimed Gateway City Craft Beer & Wine Festival, an annual celebration that has captivated visitors for years and is set to return once again this Fall!</p>
<p>Join us in the heart of downtown Lake City for an unparalleled sampling of beer, wine, cider, and more, featuring an array of local and international flavors. Not to be missed are the delightful non-alcoholic sampling options, thoughtfully included for designated drivers.</p>
<p>While you indulge in these heavenly libations, tantalize your taste buds with the mouthwatering offerings of a diverse selection of food trucks and vendors. Sit back, unwind and soak in the charming ambience of downtown Lake City while relishing in a memorable experience that promises to delight all of your senses.</p>
</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div class="fl-col-group fl-node-i0l6wt7drkf9 fl-col-group-nested" data-node="i0l6wt7drkf9">

		<h2 class="fl-heading">
		<span class="fl-heading-text">Business Excellence Awards</span>
	</h2>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="fl-module fl-module-rich-text fl-node-7irgyvmo8uhj" data-node="7irgyvmo8uhj">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<div class="fl-rich-text">
	<p>Join us in celebrating the thriving business community in our area with the prestigious Business Excellence Awards. As a Chamber, we take pride in recognizing the exceptional accomplishments of businesses in our community.</p>
<p>This is our chance to honor the best of the best in various categories, including Employer of the Year, Best New Business, and more. Don't miss this opportunity to applaud the remarkable achievements of our local businesses while networking with like minded business professionals!</p>
</div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

	<div class="fl-col-content fl-node-content"><div class="fl-module fl-module-heading fl-node-f5ykxjoqmzsi" data-node="f5ykxjoqmzsi">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<h2 class="fl-heading">
		<span class="fl-heading-text">Legislative Breakfast </span>
	</h2>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="fl-module fl-module-rich-text fl-node-y7kcza2ge6h0" data-node="y7kcza2ge6h0">
	<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
		<div class="fl-rich-text">
	<p>We are dedicated to championing the interests of our members across the local, state, and federal levels. To underscore this commitment, we proudly organize the annual “Legislative Breakfast,” an important occasion that grants our esteemed business community an invaluable chance to connect and engage with the elected officials shaping their community.</p>
<p>This flagship event stands as a cornerstone of our organization, epitomizing a convergence of impactful advocacy and meaningful relationship cultivation.</p>
</div>
	</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
	</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
		jQuery(document).ready(function($){

			// PASS THROUGH SL PARAMS TO LIVECHAT FROM SESSION
			//var lc_params = []];
			var lc_params = {};
			var param;
			for (key in sessionStorage) {
				if(sessionStorage[key] && key.includes('SL_') ){
					label = ucwords(key);
					//param = { 'name' : label, 'value' : sessionStorage[key]};
					lc_params[label] = sessionStorage[key];
					//lc_params.push(param);
				}
			}

			//lc_params.push({ 'name' : 'Website', 'value' : window.location.href});
			//lc_params['Website'] = window.location.href;

			//console.table(lc_params);

			// INITIATE LIVECHAT & PASS CUSTOM PARAMETERS
			window.__lc = window.__lc || {};
			window.__lc.license = 11315592;
			//window.__lc.params = lc_params;
			;(function(n,t,c){function i(n){return e._h?e._h.apply(null,n):e._q.push(n)}var e={_q:[],_h:null,_v:"2.0",on:function(){i(["on",c.call(arguments)])},once:function(){i(["once",c.call(arguments)])},off:function(){i(["off",c.call(arguments)])},get:function(){if(!e._h)throw new Error("[LiveChatWidget] You can't use getters before load.");return i(["get",c.call(arguments)])},call:function(){i(["call",c.call(arguments)])},init:function(){var n=t.createElement("script");n.async=!0,n.type="text/javascript",n.src="https://cdn.livechatinc.com/tracking.js",t.head.appendChild(n)}};!n.__lc.asyncInit&&e.init(),n.LiveChatWidget=n.LiveChatWidget||e}(window,document,[].slice))


			// PASS THROUGH DATA TO LIVECHAT
			$('.field-email input[type=email]').change(function(){
				if( $(this).val() ){
					console.log($(this).val());
					LiveChatWidget.call("set_customer_email", $(this).val());
				}
			});

			$('.field-first-name input, .field-last-name input').change(function(){
				var first_name = $('.field-first-name input').val();
				var last_name = $('.field-last-name input').val();
				if(  first_name && last_name ){
					console.log(first_name+' '+last_name);
					LiveChatWidget.call("set_customer_name", first_name+' '+last_name);
				}
			});


			// NEW METHOD OF PASSING INTEGRATION DATA
			LiveChatWidget.call("update_session_variables", lc_params);

			// PASS FILLED FORM DETAILS TO LIVECHAT
			$('.gfield_visibility_visible input, .gfield_visibility_visible select').on('change', function(){

				var type = $(this).prop('nodeName');

				if(type == 'INPUT'){
					var label = $(this).attr('placeholder').replace(' *', '');
				} else if (type == 'SELECT'){
					console.log
					var label = $(this).closest('.gfield').find('label').text().replace('*', '');
				}

				if( $(this).val() ){
					var value = $(this).val();
					console.log( label+': '+value );
					lc_params[label] = value;
					LiveChatWidget.call("update_session_variables", lc_params);
				}

			});

			// LIVECHAT - GET EXISTING CUSTOMER DATA
			function onReady(initialData) {
			// Chat Widget is ready

				var state = initialData.state;
				var customerData = initialData.customerData;
				//console.table(customerData);

				if(customerData.name){
					console.log('Customer Name Found');
					var name = customerData.name.split(' ');
					$('.field-first-name input').val(name[0]);

					var i;
					var last_name = '';
					for (k in name){
						if (k >= 1){
							if(name[k]){
								last_name += ' '+name[k];
							}
						}
					}

					$('.field-last-name input').val(last_name);
				}

				if(customerData.email){
					console.log('Customer Email Found');
					var name = customerData.name.split(' ');
					$('input[type=email]').val(customerData.email);
				}
			}

			LiveChatWidget.on('ready', onReady)


			// UCWORDS FUNCTION
			function ucwords(string) {
				str = string.replace('SL_', '');
				str = str.replace('_', ' ');
				str = str.toLowerCase();
				var words = str.split(' ');
				str = '';
				for (var i = 0; i < words.length; i++) {
					var word = words[i];
					word = word.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + word.slice(1);
					if (i > 0) { str = str + ' '; }
					str = str + word;
				}
				return str;
			}
		});
	});</script>
